text:
Could this be a thing for AlphaZero.jl?
It feels like that “I would use a traditional minimax classical AI search, but it is 2021 so I have to use ML”, type problem.

text: To what conversation are you replying?
An algorithm to explore relaxation strats, given a descripotion of the problem

elements.text: An algorithm to explore relaxation strats, given a descripotion of the problem

text:
The interesting thing about this would be that those different strategies are usually not brought together, because people convert it to less abstract representations than MTK offers and by that preventing some relxation. Example:
Dynamic process optimization stuff is usually discretized in fixed time steps and then handed of to an NLP/QP solvers, this makes systematic exploration of the kind of discretization/integration rule or using a simplified dynamic to get a first estimate impossible without human intervention.
Transforming a control problems into an multiple shooting usually involves rewriting the system to generate the sensitivites of the shooting points which wasn't usually done either.
